title:
Hi, I live in New Haynes Co. Castle Haynes.I am in the process of cleaning out a large area in my back yard. I need the information, where I can take the yard waste at no charge. 

Thank you,

Brenda Shermer
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2009/09/who-handles-yard-waste-disposal-in-new-hanover-county/
